title: Gochuumon wa Usagi Desu ka? Bloom (Is the Order a Rabbit? Bloom)
synopsis: Although the year is coming close to an end, there is no lack of fun for Kokoa Hoto and the other café waitresses! From bazaars to festivals, life is as enjoyable as it gets. As for Chino Kafuu and her middle school friends—the friendly Megumi Natsu and the playful Maya Jouga—they begin to look towards the future and decide on a high school to enroll in.
related_anime: ['Gochuumon wa Usagi Desu ka??: Sing for You', 'Gochuumon wa Usagi desu ka?']
